Storing your boots upright is a great way to maintain their shape and prevent creasing.

And ah, your trusty old oxfords! It's great that you're planning to give them some TLC. Polishing them will definitely help restore their shine and make them look great again. Remember to use a good quality polish and follow the instructions carefully to avoid damaging the leather.

It's also wonderful that you're taking care of your shoes and making an effort to maintain them. That's a great way to make your shoes last longer and look their best. You must have made a great impression at your job interview last year, and with your oxfords looking sharp again, you'll be ready for any future opportunities that come your way!

Remember to take your time and be gentle when polishing your oxfords. It's a process that requires some patience, but the end result will be worth it. If you have any questions or need any tips, feel free to ask!
